fields.name: `[prefix]invite / INVITE / Invite`
fields.value:
```txt
Displays an invite link for the bot
```

fields.name: `[prefix]cats / CATS / cat / CAT`
fields.value: ```Displays a cute picture/gif of a cat.```

fields.name: `[prefix]dogs / DOGS / dog / DOG`
fields.value: ```Displays a cute pic of a dog.```

fields.name: `[prefix]join_voice / vc / join / join_vc`
fields.value: ```Bot Joins the voice chat the user is currently in.```

fields.name: `[prefix]leave_voice / leave / leave_vc`
fields.value: ```Bot leaves the vc it is currently in.```

fields.name: `[old_prefix]setprefix / setpre prefix="[new_prefix]"`
fields.value:
```Changes the command prefix for the bot to new_prefix.
Please note that the new prefix should be enclosed in quotes; leave no space between the " and the "="```

fields.name: `[prefix]resetpre / resetprefix / reset_prefix`
fields.value: ```Resets the command prefix to the default "ub."```
